title: ‘We Will See about the Legs’: Remco Evenepoel Returns to Racing at Tour de France Test
content:
With first Tour de France on the horizon, Belgian superstar claims he’s putting no pressure on himself in Dauphiné: 'Day by day.'

Read the full article at ‘We Will See about the Legs’: Remco Evenepoel Returns to Racing at Tour de France Test on Velo.
author: sstokes
